docs.abstract: If the soles of your shoes show uneven wear, throw them out. Focus downward.
docs.snippet: If the soles of your shoes show uneven wear, throw them out. Focus downward.
docs.lead_paragraph: Focus downward. “We tend to live in our heads,” says Jessica Rose, a professor of orthopedic surgery at Stanford University and director of the Motion & Gait Lab at Lucile Packard Children’s Hospital in Palo Alto, Calif. “We should be directing more attention to our feet.”

docs.abstract: This sentence is like a parlor game: You can apply its structure to nearly everything.
docs.snippet: This sentence is like a parlor game: You can apply its structure to nearly everything.
docs.lead_paragraph: — From “The Juniper Tree” (NYRB Classics, 2018, Page 10), by Barbara Comyns. “The Juniper Tree” was the English writer’s ninth book, originally published in 1985 by Methuen.

headline.main: New Sentences: From ‘The Juniper Tree,’ by Barbara Comyns

headline.main: Joshua Werber’s Floral Headpieces for Artists

docs.abstract: In what sense can we be certain that Sean Connery ever even existed?
docs.snippet: In what sense can we be certain that Sean Connery ever even existed?
docs.lead_paragraph: Nichole writes: Over a decade ago, my sister tried to prove to me that Sean Connery starred in “You Only Live Twice,” but I refuse to believe her. That man doesn’t look like Sean Connery, and the voice is all wrong. Every now and then it comes up, and I still say she’s wrong.

headline.main: Judge John Hodgman on the Epistemological Terror of James Bond Films
headline.print_headline: Bonus Advice From Judge John Hodgman

docs.abstract: The White House correspondent on freedom of the press, the value of the White House press briefing and becoming a reaction meme.
docs.snippet: The White House correspondent on freedom of the press, the value of the White House press briefing and becoming a reaction meme.
docs.lead_paragraph: You’ve been a White House correspondent for 21 years. To some extent, there’s always been an adversarial role between the White House and reporters. How do you feel about the tenor of things now? It used to be friendly-adversarial. There would be retaliation for stories they didn’t like, but nothing compared with this. There’s a war going on. For a president to come out with the term “fake news” — he’s putting targets on our heads. He has moved the goal posts when it comes to how politicians and people deal with the press.

headline.main: April Ryan Asks Political Questions No One Else Will
headline.print_headline: April Ryan Asks Political Questions No One Else Will

docs.abstract: Keep it simple and don’t embarrass yourself.
docs.snippet: Keep it simple and don’t embarrass yourself.
docs.lead_paragraph: Take an anthropological approach. It helps to know something of the mythology and culture of a place before you decide what you’ll be called there. “If you’re going into a new environment — whether that’s a video game, or a social-media platform, or a subreddit — look into the social norms of that community first,” says Nikki Crenshaw, a researcher at Blizzard Entertainment, the maker of World of Warcraft and other online games.

headline.main: How to Choose an Online Handle
headline.print_headline: How to Choose an Online Handle

docs.abstract: Whether a trench coat or a jumpsuit, this season’s tailoring pays homage to both the precision and eccentricity of Savile Row. The bold looks hit the soggy streets of London for T’s first digital cover story.
docs.snippet: Whether a trench coat or a jumpsuit, this season’s tailoring pays homage to both the precision and eccentricity of Savile Row. The bold looks hit the soggy streets of London for T’s first digital cover story.
docs.lead_paragraph: Whether a trench coat or a jumpsuit, this season’s tailoring pays homage to both the precision and eccentricity of Savile Row. The bold looks hit the soggy streets of London for T’s first digital cover story.

docs.abstract: Start with an eight-footer. Wear a long-sleeve shirt.
docs.snippet: Start with an eight-footer. Wear a long-sleeve shirt.
docs.lead_paragraph: “You can’t be afraid of it; that’s when you hurt yourself,” says Jerome Young, who cracks a 10-foot braided leather bullwhip atop his horse as part of the Buffalo Soldiers of Seattle, a group that performs across the country in the historical garb of the all-black military regiments formed after the Civil War. A whip can inflict serious harm. Don’t lean away or flinch at the gunshot-like popping sound. Wear a long-sleeve shirt to protect your skin. “At some point, you’ll hit yourself,” Young says.

docs.abstract: The war in Somalia has turned into a small version of Afghanistan.
